label: uncl7047
comment: Code specifying the direction in which a sample was taken.

values.label: Longitudinal
values.comment: Sample was taken in a lengthways direction.

values.label: Transverse
values.comment: Sample was taken in a crosswise direction.

values.label: Radial
values.comment: Sample was taken originating from the centre outward.

values.label: Axial
values.comment: A sample was taken along a line which divides a regular figure symmetrically.

values.label: Thickness
values.comment: In the direction of the thickness of the specimen.

values.label: Diagonal
values.comment: Sample taken in the diagonal direction.
